SEEALSO: Find, FindNoCase, REFind, REReplace, REReplaceNoCase, REMatch
DESCRIPTION: Uses a regular expression (RE) to search a string for a pattern, starting from a specified position. The search is case-insensitive.
EXAMPLE: <!--- Find all the URLs in a web page retrieved via cfhttp:. ---> result = REMatch("https?://([-\w\.]+)+(:\d+)?(/([\w/_\.]*(\?\S+)?)?)?", cfhttp.filecontent);

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Regular expression for which to search. Case-insensitive. For more information, see Using Regular Expressions in Functions in the Developing ColdFusion Applications.
A string or a variable that contains one. String in which to search.
